channel.title: Official boriz_laptop Thread
channel.description:
K Okay it's been approved by me. Let's get on with it.
Those of you who don't know, I'm building a laptop inside a suitcase. VARY KOOL
Most recent pic: [img]http://img2.imageshack.us/img2/958/dscf0983.jpg[/img]
I got a new keyboard since then, currently trimming it to make it a bit more pro.
Earlier threads to familiarize yourself: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345030.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,348463.0.html
I'm practically done to be honest. Now I gotta put the keyboard in somehow and close this badboy up.
To do list: -new keyboard remapping -LED placement (lighting or whatever) -sound speaker led has been rerouted to indicate power -usb hub led is unused at the moment, I need ideas on this -laptop power (when on) led has not been used yet, but wires are routed and availible. I originally planned on making this connected to a solid state switch to control external peripherals (sound, hdd, cooling fan power) but right now it doesn't look like it's possible. -lighting, as said above -cut out a control panel, I've run into enough problems making one before. -sound AUX INPUT -damn laptop main sound output broke, using the backup spdif output now, working nicely. -SAT antenna coax connector -wireless mouse receiver placement -audio control knob (looks like a silver wheel) -extra usb ports -ethernet cat6 cable relocation -REED switch activation vial with green backlight (maybe change colour?) -suggestions?
I need to make a damn layout of how it's going to look because I can't cut the limited plexiglas that I have without planning it out.
That's probably my first priority right now. I'll draw this crap out at school.
Right now I need suggestions for said topics above. Any help is appreciated. I'll grant you with more pics when my keyboard is ready to be used. Right now everything is all over the place.
No matter what, this will look epic when complete. The top monitor portion is done, I just have to secure it on and put some vignal on top because gold is a crappy colour for a laptop.
EDIT: I have 5 hotkeys on my keyboard, looking for functions to bind them to.
I need: -track + track - (maybe) pause/play
Io volume stuff, I have a volume knob to do that for me. Looking for suggestions

item.title: Official boriz_laptop Thread
item.dc:creator: @boriz boriz
item.description:
@boriz wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:277365”]What OS is that? (Picture is too blurry)
Which motherboard is that?[/quote]

It’s the guts from a Toshiba AV600

Cheese_Police:

looks like linux with kde running (my guess is kubuntu…)

YEP!

runescape3dude:

you should add an 18port ethernet router into the back, you never know when this may come in handy, eg hacking.

I don’t hack and usually if i’m at someone’s house they are generous enough to offer me 802.11g or ethernet.
If I had some extra money that would actually be a good idea. Fitting in a switch would be practically impossible due to the space constraints.

Read full topic

item.description:
@boriz wrote:

K Okay it’s been approved by me. Let’s get on with it.

Those of you who don’t know, I’m building a laptop inside a suitcase.
VARY KOOL

Most recent pic:

I got a new keyboard since then, currently trimming it to make it a bit more pro.

Earlier threads to familiarize yourself:

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

programming, irc, cars

-new keyboard remapping
-LED placement (lighting or whatever)
-sound speaker led has been rerouted to indicate power
-usb hub led is unused at the moment, I need ideas on this

-lighting, as said above
-cut out a control panel, I’ve run into enough problems making one before.
-sound AUX INPUT
-damn laptop main sound output broke, using the backup spdif output now, working nicely.
-SAT antenna coax connector
-wireless mouse receiver placement
-audio control knob (looks like a silver wheel)
-extra usb ports

-suggestions?

I need to make a damn layout of how it’s going to look because I can’t cut the limited plexiglas that I have without planning it out.

That’s probably my first priority right now. I’ll draw this crap out at school.

Right now I need suggestions for said topics above. Any help is appreciated. I’ll grant you with more pics when my keyboard is ready to be used. Right now everything is all over the place.

No matter what, this will look epic when complete. The top monitor portion is done, I just have to secure it on and put some vignal on top because gold is a crappy colour for a laptop.

-track +
